original_title: 2018 GFRIEND FIRST CONCERT 'Season of GFRIEND' ENCORE
overview: With more songs and new special stages, the South Korean girl group GFriend perform songs from their mini albums 'Time for the Moon Night' and 'Sunny Summer' on the encore shows of the asian tour 'Season of GFriend'.
title: 2018 GFRIEND FIRST CONCERT 'Season of GFRIEND' ENCORE
